name: Tux's Revenge
description:
A game by MCL and Looki2000.

Hi, this is our submissions to the 2022 Linux Game Jam.

It features Tux as the protagonist and it's a first person shooter where you fight laptops, CRTs, and MSN butterflies.


It uses the ZDoom engine which is a source port of IdTech, the engine used by Doom. This is not a Doom mod, but rather a separate game with its own weapons, levels, and textures; we took some GUI textures from FreeDOOM to save time, but they will be replaced in future versions. We're planning to eventually remake this game with a more capable graphics engine like OGRE or IrrLicht.

See README.HTM for more info! Legal info:

ENGINE SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/rheit/zdoom

ENGINE LICENSE: GPLv3

GAME SOURCE CODE: No need to provide it, simply open the WADs with a tool like SLADE

GAME-SPECIFIC SCRIPT LICENSE: MIT License

Used software: Blender, SLADE, Doom Builder, OpenMPT, LMMS, Audacity, The GIMP, and ZDoom; all of those are Free Software.
